tickets.notes: Eskalirano KYC timu i pruzena pomoc za povlacenje sredstava
tickets.feedback: We properly escalated to the KYC team to accept L2 for the user to successfully withdraw the funds they had on their balance. üëç

tickets.notes: Nije lepo objasnjen proces za konfirmaciju withdrawal-a preko Paramount provajdera
tickets.feedback:
Instead of sharing the hint about the email address, we could explain that the funds should be withdrawn to the bank account the user used earlier to deposit.

Only if the user has multiple bank accounts linked to the same email address as the one linked to their Stake account and autodeposit isn't enabled on any of those accounts, the user will have the option to choose the bank account to which they wish to withdraw the funds. If the user didn't have that option, the funds should be withdrawn to the bank account with the same email address.

Informing the user that the withdrawal is still processing was correct, but our explanation could've been better.

Upon checking on ACP, the withdrawal was initiated before the user contacted us, so the Security question was already selected and the Security answer was provided. Therefore, we should've informed the user that if autodeposit isn't enabled on their bank account, they should check all folders to find the email from the payment provider.

After they find it and provide the exact same answer to the mentioned question, the withdrawal will be processed further.

tickets.notes: Nalog nije suspendovan iako je korisnik priznao da je main nalog bio excludovan za gambling addiction.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, this ticket wasn't handled correctly. The situation here was obvious - the user made this account to contact us regarding their main account, which is restricted, so we were obligated to suspend this one, as well.

The user provided us with the email linked to their main account, and we were obligated to check it by searching on ACP. If we searched the email, we would see that the main account is excluded and restricted for RG. Based on that, we should've escalated this to the available senior/specialist for placing a role on this account. Sadly, we failed to do so.

Further, the user mentioned asking for the 6-month exclusion for being addicted to gambling, and once again, the matter wasn't escalated.

They registered their main account through their Facebook account, as they mentioned, so sending the macro for losing access to the linked email address wasn't appropriate. Our team won't be able to help them change the linked email address, but they could help them change their login method to using a password instead of their Facebook account, and that should've been explained. However, the main account is excluded and restricted, so our team won't be able to help them while restrictions are assigned and the account is banned.

We mentioned that the user can contact us via live chat or email - since the main account is banned, using live chat isn't available, so that information wasn't correct.
tickets.additionalNote: Vracam ti dok ne dobijemo update od strane Mare pa neka ga kod tebe

tickets.notes:
Nismo pomogli nista u vezi verifikacije, niti objasnili.

Takodje, nismo adresirali korisnikov zahtev da zatvori nalog.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, we didn't handle this ticket properly.

The user needed our assistance with the required verification, and we failed assisting them.

They struggled with L3, so we should've checked why KYC wasn't accepting their documents by searching their username on Slack. Based on the previous updates from our team, we could inform the user of what they did incorrectly in the past. We should've informed them about the acceptable documents for L3 and shared the article with all of them. After that, if the user confirms that their documents are submitted, we must escalate to the KYC team for a review.

Additionally, we failed to address the user's request for more information about closing an account. Their account is already restricted, so we could've added something similar to this:

"We offer an account closure option on the site; however, your account is already restricted, and you are unable to use our services. Since your account is placed in the withdrawal-only mode, there is no need to initiate the mentioned procedure.

Regarding the status of your account, we will be more than happy to help you with the required verification. Please review the article with acceptable documents for L3:

**adding article

Don't hesitate to contact us once you submit a document, and a request for a review will be sent. "

tickets.notes: Transakcija uredno proverena i korisnik upucen da kontaktira fundsrecovery za dalju pomoc.
tickets.feedback:
The transaction was properly checked, and we confirmed that the funds were sent to an address linked to the user's account.

Based on that, we properly forwarded the user to contact our fundsrecovery team for further assistance.

Upon checking, the funds were credited to the user's balance, so our assistance in this conversation was great. Well done! üôå

tickets.notes:
Poslao korisnika na recovery da promeni email, sto nece biti moguce jer je nalog excludovan.

Takodje, nalog je napravljen preko Google-a a nije objasnjeno je jedino moguce promeniti login metod.
tickets.feedback:
Since we don't offer an account deletion option on the site, the first sentence shouldn't state that there is no need to delete an account. Instead, we should've only explained that such an option isn't available on the site.

Also, we should've mentioned that since their account is excluded, all other accounts they attempt to make will be restricted upon detection and highly reccomend not creating a new one.

Furthermore, we failed to check that this account was created through the Google account:


Based on that, we should've explained to the user that they would only be able to request a login method change, meaning to switch to logging with a password in the future. If they agree with that, we can forward them to our team for the login method change. After this is performed, their email will be changed as well. Our obligation was to check this and explain to the user.

However, the mentioned procedure won't be possible while an account is under exclusion, so there was no need to forward them to contact the team in charge.

tickets.notes: Nismo ubrzali korisniku verifikaciju, iako je jasno zatrazio da bi mogao da povuce sredstva.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, we failed to speed up the verification process for this user.

They clearly inquired about their verification, as it was required to be able to withdraw the funds.

Please check this Confluence page to learn more about cases where we can speed up the verification process: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/50069505/KYC+speed-up+situations

tickets.notes: Pogresno smo informisali korisnika da sredstva sa balansa moze da povuce na wallet/external exchange a ima VND na nalogu.
tickets.feedback:
We correctly informed the user that we don't have any exchange services on the site, so they won't be able to convert fiat to crypto currencies.

"Since Stake has no exchange options, you would need to withdraw the relevant currency to an external exchange/wallet." > We haven't explained this correctly to the user:

"Since you won't be able to convert fiat to cryptocurrencies on the site, you will only be able to withdraw your VND balance to your bank account.

tickets.notes: Pogresno smo informisali korisnika o kodu koji moze da deli kad on moze da deli samo link.
tickets.feedback:
We wrongly informed the user about their "personal affiliate code". The user is not an official affiliate, so they don't have a code to share with new users.

This user can only share their affiliate link, as shown in the photo that was shared.

Furthermore, we could improve our efficiency by explaining the process of sharing an affiliate link like this:

"When sharing an affiliate link with new users (since you won't be able to refer to already registered accounts), it is important to inform them about the following:

*They must click on the link and register without entering anyone's code in the "code-optional" field,
*They shouldn't be on the same connection as you,
*They should disable extensions/adblockers that could prevent them from registering successfully through your link."

tickets.notes: Uredno eskalirano senioru za postavljanje Whitelist rola nakon provere sa KYC timom.
tickets.feedback: We properly checked with the KYC team, and once they confirmed that the user is not from Ontario, the issue has been escalated to an available senior for placing the Whitelist role. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes:
Odlicno objasnjenjo sta Casino exclusion podrazumeva i korisnik obavesten o periodima koje nudimo.

Nakon njegove odluke, restrikcija uredno postavljena od strane seniora.
tickets.feedback:
We provided the user with a detailed explanation about the Casino exclusion and what it entails, so great job for that. Also, available periods were mentioned.

After the user made a decision, we properly escalated the matter to an available senior to place restrictions, and informed the user accordingly about it. üôå

tickets.notes: Korisnik nije mogao da povuce sredstva zbog AML-a te je ovde nepotrebno trazeno da se nalog verifikuje.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, this ticket wasn't handled properly.

The user was unable to withdraw the funds due to the AML policy, which we can check under ACP/Money Laundering/Outstanding:


Since their account was suspended before contacting us, the proper course of action here was to escalate this matter to an available Specialist/Senior to clear the outstanding, since the user clearly stated that they don't want to verify.

No matter their statement, we correctly informed them about the required verification. However, L2 wasn't required for them to be able to withdraw the funds (if it's fiat, they will be required to do so).

Additionally, even if we understand why the limits were suggested (need it for rent), there was no need to mention this since their account was restricted and they were unable to use our services.

The main inquiry was about their funds, and sadly, we didn't help them efficiently.

tickets.notes: Transakcija uredno proverena i korisnik poslat na fundsrecovery email.
tickets.feedback:
The transaction was properly checked, and we confirmed that the funds were sent to an address linked to the user's account.

Based on that, we properly forwarded the user to contact our fundsrecovery team for further assistance.

Upon checking, the funds were credited to the user's balance, so our assistance in this conversation was great. Well done! üôå

tickets.notes: Korisnik pogresno informisan da ce withdrawal biti cancelovan ukoliko pogresno unese secret answer vise puta (3) - ovo vazi za Gigadat ali ne i za Paramount.
tickets.feedback:
We wrongly informed the user that the withdrawal will fail if the secret answer is incorrectly entered 3 times.

While this is a process for Gigadat (Interac) transactions, sadly, it is not the same for the Paramount. Ensure to check the official update on the following link:

https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C047JB6UNQ3/p1769991168830379?thread_ts=1769083229.345299&cid=C047JB6UNQ3

The user should have been forwarded to check their emails to locate the emails for both withdrawals. After they enter the correct secret answer for each withdrawal, they should be processed further to the bank account.

In case they don't know or can't remember the secret answers, we have no options to provide them with the answers.

tickets.notes:
Samo je informisala korisnika da se withdrawali procesuiraju 3 radna dana.

S obzirom da je status waiting confirmation, ovde je trebalo objasniti kako da se potvrdi transakcija da bi bila dalje procesuirana.
tickets.feedback:
Upon checking the status of the withdrawal in question on ACP, we can confirm that the transaction wasn't confirmed at the time the user contacted us:

Instead of confirming that the withdrawal will be processed within 3 business days, we should've instructed the user to confirm the transaction so it can be processed further to the bank account.

"It seems that the withdrawal in question is not confirmed yet.

While requesting a withdrawal, you are required to select the Secret question and provide a Secret answer if autodeposit isn't enabled on your bank account.

After this, the withdrawal will be initiated on our side, and you should receive an email from the payment provider with the same Secret question. Only after you confirm the transaction by entering the correct Secret answer, the withdrawal in question will be processed further.

Please check your inbox and other folders so you can confirm the withdrawal.

In case you don't receive the email within 3 business days, feel free to contact us for further assistance."

This was their first transaction with Paramount, a new provider, and we had to provide more information for that.

tickets.notes: Trebalo je jasno objasniti da mi ne mozemo da pruzimo overall P&L samo za sports section. Takodje smo mogli da posaljemo P&L screenshot umesto wager statistika, jer to korisnik nije trazio.
tickets.feedback:
We should have clearly explained that only total P&L stats can be shared, and it is not possible to provide stats for the Sports section separately.

Since the user asked for the stats from opening their account, instead of asking if they wish to receive their overall stats, we could share a screenshot with a statement similar to this:

"While we are unable to share overall stats for the Sports section only, we are sending your overall stats from the moment your account was created."

The user wasn't asking for their wager stats, so it was unnecessary to mention that part.

tickets.notes: Korisnik je imao C role kad se javio, a poslat je da menja email. Iako je u pitanju isti email (recovery) ovde je trebalo pojasniti korisniku da se salje da dokaze da je vlasnik naloga.
tickets.feedback:
The C role for a potentially compromised account was assigned before the user contacted us.

Even though we sent the user to the correct email (recovery@stake.com), we should have informed the user that they needed to complete the account ownership procedure, as they reported that their account was compromised, and after that, their email could be changed.

tickets.notes: Komunikacija losa - ne mozemo na prvu da kazemo da nema refund i to je to. Trebalo je bolje pristupiti i pojasniti
tickets.feedback:
This ticket could have been handled more efficiently.

Even if we clearly understand what the user was referring to, the proper explanation would be like this:

"Please note that the system cannot place a bet without a user sending a request to the server that he wants to place a bet while clicking on the bet button.

It would be best to check the details at least twice before hitting the bet button, instead of placing 7 bets at the same time.

From what we can see, there were no irregularities found in the recently placed bets. However, please check your bets, and if you notice anything suspicious, provide us with the bet ID so we can further check the round.

Feel free to check your recent bets on the following link: https://stake.com/my-bets/casino

Regarding you experiencing issues where the screen refreshed, and you couldn't see the ball, it could be due to using an outdated device and/or browser. Please check your internet connection and switch to using the Google Chrome browser, for example.

Hopefully, you won't experience anything similar in the future, but note that we are here to assist you, so don't hesitate to contact us for any further assistance."

The user didn't ask for a refund directly, so we could avoid stating that in the first sentence, and instead try to explain as mentioned. If they eventually ask for a refund, we would explain that refunds are not possible when everything is settled correctly.

tickets.notes:
Ovaj tiket je mogao biti resen bez otvaranja Jira case-a.

Igrica je dostupna svima, te smo mogli da proverimo game rules. Free spinovi ne dobijaju sa 3 scatter-a, sto smo mogli da vidimo na slici koju je korisnik poslao.
tickets.feedback:
Everything was properly explained to the user, once checked with the Tech team.

However, this is something that could've easily been checked from our end. Since the user was referring to the free spins, we could see, in the in-game rules, that free spins are triggered with 4 or more scatters.

Based on the screenshot the user sent, they had 3 scatters, so we could conclude that no issues happened here.

Sadly, this conversation prolonged for more than it needed to be prior to opening a Jira case and waiting for an update.

Additionally, you could've avoided asking the user for a bet ID, as we can see a Round ID on the screenshot they provided, which means that we could've found the bet ID ourselves.

Here's how to do that:
- This is a round ID, and we can search it when we go to ACP > Search > Thirdparty Round ID
- When you search the round ID, you just need to open Raw data to find the bet ID

Although a bet ID was not necessary here, as everything could've been checked within the in-game rules, the above explanation can help you in the future with inquiries where we have a Round ID, but do not have a bet ID.

tickets.notes:
Korisnik je zatrazio refund za betove koje je neko drugi postavio na njegovom nalogu.

Ovde nista nije objasnjeno, osim da ne nudimo refund. Rekla korisniku da proveri detalje pre postavljanja betova, iako je rekao da je betove postavio neko drugi.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, we didn't handle this ticket correctly.

As per the user's statement, someone had access to their account and placed bets for which they required a refund.

Advising the user to double-check all details before placing bets was unnecessary since the bets weren't placed by the user (according to them).

Besides confirming that refunds are not possible, we should have mentioned the following:

*Please note that selling/sharing an account with others is against the policy, as an account is indeed for personal use only. Please refer to the Terms of Service policy, especially section 4 regarding the user's responsibility here: https://stake.com/policies/terms

*According to our policy, the users are solely responsible for the security of their accounts, so we highly suggest securing your account by changing your password in the first place. Ensure that you set a strong password on your Stake account and device, and don't disclose the data to anyone.
*Suggest enabling 2FA as an additional step of security.
*Suggest logging out after they finish playing.
tickets.additionalNote: poveƒáala sam knowledge, jer ona ovo zna, samo nije ispratila u poruci da je neko drugi to potro≈°io navodno; vi≈°e tu ispa≈°ta customer experience, jer je mogla bolje da objasni

tickets.notes:
Nalog nije bio proveren - korisnik je official affiliate i ovde smo mogli da proverimo da je rec o komisiji.

Takodje, nije bilo potrebe da kazemo da korisnik moze da povuce sredstva (BOB fiat) kad nema tu local currency enablovanu na nalogu.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, we failed to check the user's account.

The user is an official affiliate (has a tag on their account), and we could check their balance.

Since BOB is a fiat currency and this user doesn't have that local currency enabled, there was no need to confirm that they can withdraw the funds.

This was clearly a request regarding their affiliate commission, but sadly, we failed to address that.

After the user sent a photo where we could see that they aren't able to withdraw the fiat currency, the issue has been escalated to an available senior for conversion. However, the conversation could have been resolved much earlier.
tickets.additionalNote: da nije otvorila acp, nije, i zbog toga je ok da se smanje i proces i knowledge, kao i efikasnost, jer je bezveze poslala da nemamo exchange; ali ne mogu da joj ostavim ovo na 50%, na kraju je odraƒëeno ≈°ta treba kad je provereno i razja≈°njeno

tickets.notes: Uredno proverena transakcija i korisnik upucen da kontaktira svoju banku ili proba da depozituje sa drugom karticom.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the transaction in question and found the explanation for the exact status on the Confluence page.

The user was correctly forwarded to contact their bank so they can allow this type of transaction. üëå

tickets.notes: Nismo ubrzali verifikaciju korisniku koji ima CAD za local currency.
tickets.feedback:
This user has enabled CAD local currency on their account, which means that L2 is required for withdrawing the funds.

Sadly, we failed to expedite their verification process.

Please check in which situations the verification process can be sped up: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/50069505/KYC+speed-up+situations

tickets.notes: Inicijalni zahtev je bio da se korisniku dozvoli da povuce sredstva, medjutim, konverzacija se vodila oko verifikacije te nismo ocistili outstanding i pomogli korisniku.
tickets.feedback:
I understand that you wanted to help this user to verify the required verification; however, their initial request was to withdraw the funds.

When continuing someone's ticket, ensure checking the conversation from the start to be sure that their request/inquiry has been addressed properly.

As the user stated, the issue was that they should wager but cannot play, so obviously, that wasn't possible due to the AML policy and restrictions on the account. Sadly, we failed to check that and escalate to an available specialist/senior for clearing.

Based on that, our efficiency and listening had to be graded.

tickets.notes: Ovo nije dobro iskomunicirano - korisniku je rekla da je nalog zatvoren a on suspendovan za underage.
tickets.feedback:
We need to be clear about the wording and strive to explain to the user the status of their account, especially in situations when an account is restricted.

If this is your macro, please edit this part:


The user's account is not closed; it is restricted and placed in the withdrawal-only mode. Therefore, we cannot say that the account is closed or that we will reopen it later.

The correct explanation would be similar to this: "Once you turn 18 years, feel free to contact us for further verification of your account. Once you complete it, the restrictions will be removed, and you will be able to use all our services just fine.

Until then, your account will remain in the mentioned mode, and you won't be able to use our services."

tickets.notes: Odlicno je objasnila proces konfirmacije withdrawal-a preko Paramount provajdera, medjutim, korisnik je rekao da ima autodeposit enablovan te nije bilo potrebe za objasnjavanjem.
tickets.feedback:
The explanation about how the withdrawal through the Paramount provider should be confirmed was correct, but there was no need to send it.

The user clearly said that they have autodeposit enabled, and in that case, the process is automatic.

Please check the official update from our team on the following link: https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C047JB6UNQ3/p1769083229345299


Instead, we should've only informed the user to allow more time for processing in this case when they have autodeposit enabled.

tickets.notes: Pragmatic mute - imali smo source coin (recent bets) te je samo trebalo pitati korisnika u kojoj valuti (CAD ili USD) je bio prikazan balans u igrici kako bi otvorili Jira case.
tickets.feedback:
Since many users don't understand what a coin pair means, we should include further explanation and a photo in the first message when asking for the exact coin pair.

Furthermore, we could have been more efficient in this case. Based on the user's recent bets, we could confirm that they played in CAD currency, and that was the source coin.

According to that, we could only ask for the target coin: "In which currency was your balance in the game displayed?"

By checking on the ACP, we know it can be CAD or USD:


It would be easier for the user to understand our request, and a Jira case would be opened after their confirmation.

tickets.notes: Data deletion/RG options
tickets.feedback:
We properly informed the user that account deletion is not an option offered on the site, and informed them about the available options.

Based on their decision, a proper macro was sent, and eventually, the user closed their account, so our efficiency was great. üëå

tickets.notes: Nismo adresirali korisnikov zahtev za povlacenje sredstava.
tickets.feedback:
We correctly explained the reason for placing the restriction on the user's account and provided the user with articles with acceptable documents.

Sadly, we failed to address their initial inquiry about not being able to withdraw the funds.

Even if an account is restricted, we are not allowed to keep their funds, so we should've asked the user to submit a document for L2 and escalated to the KYC team to temporarily accept it.

tickets.notes:
Komunikacija losa - kaze korisniku da nam javi ako zeli da otvori nalog. Kad se korisnik javi, on mu kaze da ne mozemo da mu pomognemo i korisnik logicno pita sta treba da uradi da bi mu Mihailo opet rekao da nam javi ako zeli da koristi nalog sa kog se javlja.

Takodje, taguje seniora da se otvori nalog umesto da posalje korisnika na accountclosure mail.
tickets.feedback:
In this conversation, we properly confirmed that the user restricted their account.

"you wouldn't be eligible to use or create other accounts in the future." > The user would be able to create a new account, so we could write similar to this:

"Since your account is closed, if you attempt to create a new one, it will be closed as soon as it is detected, so we highly recommend that you refrain from creating any new accounts."

When we asked the user if they wished to reopen this account, and they confirmed, the proper course of action was to forward them to the accountclosure email. Instead, we declined assistance due to having an alternative account. Upon checking, we had difficulties finding this information regarding another account.

After this, when the user once again asked what they should do, we once again asked them if they wished to reopen this account.

At the end, we wrongly escalated the issue to an available senior, since the account reopening procedure is handled by the relevant team. Of course, we should only check that the 24-hour period has passed before forwarding the user.

Please check the procedure on the following link: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/1451884627/Account+Closure
tickets.additionalNote: smanjila sam mu i komunikaciju jo≈° i knowledge, bukvalno je mogao da re≈°i tiket u jednoj poruci

tickets.notes: Ontario procedura uredno ispracena, osim slanja makroa nakon sto je Whitelist role assignovan.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked with the KYC team that this user is not from Ontario and tagged the available senior to place the Whitelist role.

After that was done, we failed to send a proper macro.


This is a part of the mentioned procedure and must be respected. It is written so the user doesn't get the impression that something was done on our side regarding this issue.

Feel free to check the procedure on the following link: https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C08SNRNNMRP/p1763991580361409

Please ensure sending this exact macro in situations like this one in the future.

tickets.notes:
Uredno smo informisali korisnika o withdrawal-u koji treba da potvrdi kako bi bio procesuiran.

Medjutim, nismo objasnili kako bi mogao promeni mail adresu da bi se slagala sa bankovnim racunom.
tickets.feedback:
While we properly checked the withdrawal in question and informed the user on how to confirm it, we failed to address the user's concern regarding the email address that is not the same as the one linked to their bank account.

The user shouldn't experience any issues with transactions, since the confirmation emails will be sent to the linked email. We could add something like this:

"As long as you confirm the withdrawal via the confirmation email, as explained, there shouldn't be any issues with your transactions.

However, if you wish to have the same email address on your bank account, you should change it through the banking application. In case you don't have it, simply contact your bank. With their assistance, unlink the email address from the bank account and link the same one linked to your Stake account."

tickets.notes: Korisnik nije pravilno informisan o statusu njegove transakcije - status expired (CAD deposit)
tickets.feedback:
We should have provided the user with a detailed explanation when it came to the transaction in question.

Upon checking the transaction on ACP, we can see that the status is "expired", and this most likely means that the user failed to complete the transaction process.


An expired transaction is a transaction that has been processing longer than the allowed time limit, due to which the system deems that the transaction will not get processed due to the time it has already taken, and thus the transaction will change status to expired.

It is important to inform the user that no funds should have been taken from their bank account and suggest that they check their account. If the user claims that the funds were deducted and not refunded, we can inform them to wait up to 3 business days for a refund.

In case the user complains that no funds were received after 3 days, we can suggest that they contact their bank and provide them with the CA reference number, which they can find in the confirmation email.

tickets.notes: Mogli smo korisnika direktno da posavetujemo da saceka 24 sata od poslednjeg wd-a
tickets.feedback:
As we could check, the user reached the limit of 5 pending/successful withdrawals in 24 hours, and due to that, received such an error message:

We should strive to provide the users with direct and correct information since it leads to a better customer experience.

Instead of saying to allow a few more hours, we could directly inform the user to wait 24 hours from the last successful withdrawal before they attempt to make new ones. In that way, they could calculate how many hours they should allow for the next transaction.

tickets.notes: Nismo konkretno informisali korisnika o statusu naloga sa kojeg se javlja, sto je i bilo inicijalno pitanje.
tickets.feedback:
While we informed the user about the steps they should take when it comes to the main excluded account, we failed to answer the user's initial question about the account from which they are contacting us.

We could include something similar to this:

"Note that we don't support multi-accounting on the site. Per our Terms of Service and Self-exclusion policies, this account is placed in the withdrawal-only mode since it is connected to another excluded account.

According to the policies, you won't be able to use this account anymore.

As for the main excluded account, feel free to contact us at support@stake.com for further assistance and more information."

With that, the response would be complete.

tickets.notes: Nema potrebe da se korisnik pita da li je igrao igrice Evolution provajdera kad to mozemo da pogledamo na ACP-u.
tickets.feedback:
There was no need to ask the user if they had access to the Evolution games in the past, since we have an option to check that on our end.

When you go to Casino/Games on ACP, you can see the games the user played:


As confirmed, the user never played Evolution games since they aren't available in their jurisdiction.

We can suggest troubleshooting steps, such as changing the internet connection and/or IP address, or switching from Wi-Fi to mobile data and vice versa.

However, it is important to notify the user that the game provider decides in which regions their games will be available, and that cannot be overruled by us.

tickets.notes: Odlicno handlovan tiket
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the user's account and forwarded them to submit their RTP request via email.

The ticket was handled in a nice way, and our assistance was great since the user managed to recover access to their account. üëå

tickets.notes: Ne salje makro za Ontario proceduru, samo kaze korisniku da refresh-uje stranicu.
tickets.feedback:
Regarding the Ontario procedure, a macro was written to be sent after the Whitelist role is assigned to the user's account.

It clearly states that this matter is IP-related, so changing the connection or restarting the router should help. The user must not get the impression that anything regarding this matter was done on our end.

When handling such tickets, please ensure sending this macro: "Ontario but not really"

Here is the post to check it: https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C08SNRNNMRP/p1763991580361409

tickets.notes: Uredno eskalirano senioru za dalju proveru i postavljanje restrikcije.
tickets.feedback:
The conversation was properly checked from the start, and the issue has been escalated to an available senior for further checks.

Since KYC information was the same on both accounts, proper restriction has been assigned, and the user was informed about it. üëå

tickets.notes: Ovde nazalost nismo odgovorili na jedno od korisnikovih pitanja.
tickets.feedback:
While we correctly forwarded the user to contact our team in charge to request 2FA removal, we failed to answer their second question regarding making a withdrawal.

"Since 2FA is enabled on your account, you won't be able to withdraw the funds without entering the valid code from the application.

Until our team in charge assists you with removing 2FA from your account, I'm afraid that you won't be able to withdraw the funds.

But no worries, as soon as 2FA is disabled, the code will be sent to your linked email address, and with it, you shouldn't have any issues withdrawing the funds.

Of course, after the 2FA is disabled, you can enable it again on your new device, if you wish."

tickets.notes: Nikakva pomoc nije pruzena, iako je objasnjeno kako pristupati korisnicima koji koriste Swapped za njihove transakcije.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, this ticket wasn't handled correctly.

Even though the Swapped has its own support, we have options to assist users with their transactions, so our efficiency in this ticket should have been better.

The proper course of action is to ask the user for the transaction ID of their purchase, which can be found:

1* at the bottom of the Swapped confirmation email, the user will receive for each Swapped order
2* on the Buy Crypto page, inside the Swapped model. The user should click to view all their purchases on this symbol:

Once they locate the exact transaction, they must click on the transaction to open it and find the transaction ID:


Once the user provides us with the transaction ID, we can check the transaction details and asisst them further.

Here is the post regarding this: https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C08SNRNNMRP/p1755810949779969

tickets.notes: Korisnik obavesten o procesu konfirmacije wd-a preko Interac-a a transakcija procesuira Paramount.
tickets.feedback:
As we can check on the ACP, the withdrawal in question was made through the Paramount provider:


Unfortunately, the user wasn't informed about the correct process to confirm the withdrawal, and due to that, the grade had to be lowered.

The proper explanation would be:

"When making a Paramount withdrawal, you must select a security question from the available options and create a secret answer. Please do not share this answer with anyone.

After initiating the withdrawal, you will receive an Interac withdrawal email notification. This email will display the same security question you selected during the withdrawal process.

To complete the withdrawal successfully, you must enter the same security answer in the Interac email.

The answer entered must match exactly the one provided during withdrawal creation; otherwise, the payout will fail."

Due to incorrect information, the user's transaction is still waiting to be confirmed.

tickets.notes: Uredno ubrzao verifikaciju ali nije poslao update.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the user's account and informed them about the required verification for playing Poker.

Once the user confirmed that documents were submitted, we properly expedited the verification process. However, we failed to provide the user with an update, even though it arrived only a few minutes ago.

When you inform the user that you will contact them with the update, that should be done. There is an Escalation section for this, and it is monitored to see if the user was provided with an update.

Due to this, the Escalation section had to be lowered, so please ensure providing an update in the future for the threads you created.

tickets.notes: Korisnik uredno informisan o opcijama koje nudimo na sajtu i upucen na accountclosure@stake.com u skladu sa njegovom odlukom.
tickets.feedback:
The user was properly informed about the options we offer on the site and forwarded to accountclosure@stake.com based on their decision.

The account was closed, as per the user's wish, so our efficiency was great. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes:
Ovde je korisniku receno da nemamo informaciju kad mu istice mute, sto nije tacno.

Mogao je biti upucen i na notifikacije da sam proveri.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the users' mute and informed them about the time/date their account was muted.

Unfortunately, we failed to inform them about the time/date the mute will expire. That is information which can be shared with users, so there was no reason to tell that we don't have such information to share.

Additionally, if you didn't want to share this with the user, you could instruct them to check their notifications, since they received one regarding the mute.

The only information that we should avoid sharing would be who muted them.

tickets.notes: Nalog nije uredno proveren na ACP-u. Ovde korisnik nije mislio na swapped kupovinu, vec fiat PLN deposit.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, this ticket wasn't handled correctly because the account wasn't properly checked on ACP.

The user wasn't referring to a swapped order; according to the time they contacted us, they were referring to their PLN deposit, and we failed to check that.

Ensure checking if the local currency is enabled or not on the ACP, here:


The other option would be to always check both sections, for crypto and fiat transactions. This will boost your efficiency and we won't forward customers to another support that can't help. Please always check ACP and be careful as checking all details will and can save the time and help you understand what's going on.

tickets.notes: U trenutku kad nas je kontaktirao, korisnik je uspeo da inicira withdrawal tako da je trebao biti informisan o tome.
tickets.feedback:
Right after contacting us, the user managed to initiate a fiat withdrawal.


We correctly informed the user that they don't have any more funds in their balance, but we could also inform them about the pending transaction that should be processed.

tickets.notes: Ontario procedura- uredno ispracena.
tickets.feedback: We properly checked with the KYC team, and once they confirmed that the user is not from Ontario, the issue has been escalated to an available senior for placing the Whitelist role. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes: Affiliate commission - uredno eskalirano i korisnik informisan.
tickets.feedback:
Account properly checked, and the matter was escalated to an available specialist for conversion.

The customer was informed about the funds converted and credited to their Vault.

This ticket was handled properly, so great job!

tickets.notes: Korisnik je pitao da posalje novac a ne da prebaci VIP progres - pogresno protumaceno.
tickets.feedback:
The user asked to send the funds from toobet (this was supposed to be Roobet) to Stake, and they were referring to a deposit.

Sadly, we didn't understand the user and mentioned VIP progress that cannot be transferred. Even though that is true, the user wasn't referring to that.

When we are not sure what the user is referring to, we should always ask for more information. In this case, we should've explained that they can use any platform that supports crypto transfers or even to use an exchange service like Moonpay or Swapped.
tickets.additionalNote: Ovde ne postoji ni proces ni knowledge, ovo je basic pitanje, smanjila sam proactivity i knowledge i attentive listening na improve.

tickets.notes: Trebali smo direktno da informisemo korisnika da je $50 minimum iznos potreban za konvertovanje komisije.
tickets.feedback:
The available specialist was tagged to convert the commission per user's request.

Two currencies were converted, and the user was informed about that.

As for the matter regarding the TRY currency, we should have informed the user that $50 is the minimum amount required for converting the funds.

We should strive to provide direct information when we have it, instead of saying that the commission should be a little higher.

tickets.notes: Nije proverio Affiliate sekciju na ACP-u.
tickets.feedback:
The Affiliate section must always be checked before tagging a specialist or senior.

The user has more than 50 registrations with 10% commission, so we cannot manually convert their commission.

At the end, the user was properly informed to contact the relevant team.

tickets.notes: Trebalo je odmah objasniti da mi ne mozemo da sklonimo limite koje korisnici postavljaju, kao i da objasnimo gde korisnik moze da skine limit, s obzirom da je rekao da ne zna.
tickets.feedback:
The user contacted us with a request that we remove the limit on their account since they don't know how to do it.

It wasnt enough to confirm to them that the limit was reached (they knew that based on the error message) and to forward them to the correct section on their amount.

The user was later informed that we cannot remove their limits and instructed on how to remove it on the account, but this should have been explained in the first place. We should strive to provide complete instructions and responses to all initial users' questions.

tickets.notes: Korisnik je u medjuvremenu vec dobio level-up bonus te je ovde odgovor trebao biti malo drugaciji.
tickets.feedback:
As we checked, the user already had a conversation with a VIP manager at the time of resolving a ticket. That indicates that the level-up bonus was already credited to their Vault, so our response here could be similar to this:

"Congratulations on reaching the Bronze VIP level. üçÄ

As we can check, the VIP manager already credited your level-up bonus to your Vault, so please check your balance.

If you need any further assistance, don't hesitate to contact us."

Additionally, the Response Time section is not graded this time, but please be careful in the future. Support must send the first message as soon as possible after the ticket is assigned for the RTP stats, so try sending the first opening message and checking the account/previous conversations after.
tickets.additionalNote: nema ovde neki proces ovo je samo za customer experience

tickets.notes: Korisnik je pogresno informisan da mu je main nalog indefinitely excludovan - zapravo je RG restricted.
tickets.feedback:
Please be careful when checking multiple accounts and assigned roles to ensure that you are providing the user with the correct information.

As we can check, the user's main account is restricted for RG reasons and not indefinitely excluded, as the user was informed.


Furthermore, the user's initial question wasnƒát addressed. We should directly inform the user that multiple accounts are not supported and that they won't be able to use this account anymore.

"While the Self-exclusion is active, this account will remain in withdrawal-only mode." - This part might be confusing to the user and might lead them to think that once SE ends on the main account, they will be able to use this account, so this part should be corrected.

"This account cannot be used anymore because it is connected to another restricted account.

If you need any information regarding the main account, please contact us from the linked email to support@stake.com."
tickets.additionalNote: on je ovde pogodio proces da mu je nalog zatvoren i u WD only mode samo sto nije lepo iskomunicirao, zamenila sam proces na dobro a knowledge na good

tickets.notes: Aktivan sportski bet smo mogli da vidimo da smo uredno proverili ACP.
tickets.feedback:
The user's inquiry was about the active bet not visible on their account (disappeared).

Unfortunately, we failed to check if the user had active sports bets on ACP, which was the case here. We should always check active bets (casino and sports), transactions > other (for some sportsbet adjustments), regular adjustments, and the bonuses column when handling tickets with balance issues.

Additionally, there was no need to transfer the ticket to the Sports team. We could confirm that the sports bet is still active and instruct the user where they can find it. It's possible that it was the end of your shift, but just be careful, we could've solved this ticket in first two messages.
tickets.additionalNote: Promenjen wording malo i dodato sta se sve gleda za balans.

tickets.notes: Trebalo bi proveriti nalog nakon prve poruke. Bespotrebno trazi ss od korisnika a mogao je da vidi da je BiP iniciran.
tickets.feedback:
Please ensure to check the user's account on ACP after sending the first message. It seems that in the tickets we tend to rush and close it as soon as possible, however we are losing on our efficiency and on our quality. A good percantage of the tickets can be solved while carefully checking everything before we proceed with replying and working on the ticket.

If we had opened ACP, we could've seen first that their account was under Break in play and inform them without asking for more information from them. This is the reason why the score is lowered, as you really need to be careful and check ACP regularly and as soon as you send your first reply.
tickets.additionalNote: Moramo kod feedback-a da kazemo sto je vazno da gleda ACP, da ne bude samo da mu kazemo pa imao je BIP trebalo je to da mu kazes i da obrazlozis da zato pravi greske koje ne bi trebalo, editovala sam feedback svakako.

tickets.notes: Korisnici sa Kosova ne mogu da enabluju local currency.
tickets.feedback:
Unfortunately, the ticket wasn't handled correctly.

The EUR currency is released for a few countries, but sadly, Kosovo is not one of them. Therefore, the user won't be able to enable local currency and deposit with a credit card.

Instead, we should have explained to the user that they can make crypto transactions and buy cryptocurrencies with a credit card, if services (the Moonpay or Swapped services) are available in their region.
https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/246612431/Provider+Limit

tickets.notes: L2 nije neophodan za crypto withdrawal-e. Pritom nije korisnika informisao da mora da se uloguje na nalog da bi ubacio dokumenta.
tickets.feedback:
Level 2 is not required for making crypto transactions, so we incorrectly informed the user that further verification is required.

This Confluence page can be checked for more information: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/Product/pages/863338497/Level+2+Verification+Requirements+Feature+Documentation

We should've asked for a screenshot with an error message to potentially see and resolve what is causing them issues.

Also, when the user mentioned that they can't submit documents, we should've instructed them to first log in to their account:


The verification process was expedited, and the account is L2 verified now.

https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C040LAYH8J3/p1745371148315389 This is a post that can confirm in which cases they can withdraw.

tickets.notes: Uredno prosledjen korisnik da kontaktira fundsrecovery za depozit poslat preko Base mreze.
tickets.feedback:
The transaction was properly checked, and we confirmed that the funds were sent to an address linked to the user's account.

Based on that, we properly forwarded the user to contact our fundsrecovery team for further assistance.

Well done! üôå

tickets.notes: Depozit limit - uredno objasnjeno korisniku kako moze da skloni limit, sto je on uspesno i uradio.
tickets.feedback:
We properly provided the user with instructions on how and where to remove the existing deposit limit on their account.

They managed to remove the limit, so our efficiency was great. Great job! üôå

tickets.notes: Uredno objasnjeno korisniku kako da povuce sredstva iz Vault-a.
tickets.feedback: We properly instructed the user on how to withdraw the funds from the Vault to their account balance. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes: Trebalo je proveriti nalog pre tagovanja jer je nalog vec bio suspendovan za RG.
tickets.feedback:
In this case, the score is lower as the ACP was not checked on time; there was no need here to escalate the issue since the account was already restricted a few days ago.

Please ensure checking the account on ACP after the first message, and before trying to resolve the ticket, so you have the necessary information to continue the conversation.
tickets.additionalNote: samo budi pazljiva da ne pise ovo uradio si ovo bezveze i bez ikakve potrebe itd, samo na drugaciji nacin

tickets.notes:
Uredno provereno na PIQ-u i korisnik obavesten da pokusa da promeni konekciju.

Nakon toga, napravljen uspesan depozit.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the user ID on PIQ and confirmed that this was an IP-related issue, so we properly suggested to the user to change their connection.

After that was done, a successful deposit was made. üëå

tickets.notes:
Korisnik je uredno bio informisan o depozitu koji je napravio.

S obzirom da nije mogao da povlaci sredtstva, samo je obavesten da mora da verifikuje L2. Dokument je vec bio submitovan te je ovde trebalo ubrzati verifikaciju.
tickets.feedback:
The user was properly informed about the deposit they made and instructed to allow more time for processing.

As for the withdrawal option, you correctly informed the user that L2 is required.

However, the document was submitted at that time, so we should've expedited the verification process.

Please check this Confluence page to see in which situations the verification can be sped up: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/50069505/KYC+speed-up+situations

tickets.notes: Korisnik je uredno informisan o rezultatu beta gde je Honest decision bio apliciran.
tickets.feedback:
We properly collected all necessary information to ensure providing a relevant response.

As shown in the photo the user shared with us, the Honest decision was applied, and the game was settled according to the game rules.

You could only add that since the value of their cards was under 12, the Hit option was applied, as per the rules:

tickets.notes: Ontario procedura - prvi deo ispracen ali makro na kraju nije poslat.
tickets.feedback:
The account was properly checked with the KYC team, and a shift leader was tagged to place the Whitelist role on the user's account.

Since the user shouldn't get the impression that anything regarding this matter was done on our end, the specific macro should be sent.

Feel free to check the whole procedure here: https://ego-io.slack.com/archives/C08SNRNNMRP/p1763991580361409

When dealing with such tickets in the future, ensure sending this macro ("Ontario but not really") so the procedure is properly followed.

tickets.notes: Account closure procedura uredno ispracena
tickets.feedback:
The user was properly informed about the options we offer on the site and forwarded to accountclosure@stake.com based on their decision.

The account was closed, as per the user's wish, so our efficiency was great. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes:
Korisnik ima affiliate managera te smo trebali da ga uputimo da njega kontaktira.

U slucaju da kaze da ne zna ko mu je manager niti kako da ga kontaktira, onda ga saljemo direktno na partners.
tickets.feedback:
Since this user has their affiliate manager (as we can check on the ACP), we should've forwarded them to contact the manager for further assistance and more information.

However, if the user claims that they don't know who their affiliate manager is or how to contact them, we would forward them directly to partners@stake.com, which was done at the end.

Support agents cannot asisst the user with their inquiries regarding the affiliate program, so as written here, we should forward them to their managers: https://stakedotcom.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CS/pages/782598288/Affiliate+Program

tickets.notes: Iako je proces da se local currency enable-uje isti, moramo da pazimo kada saljemo makro da ispravimo koja valuta je u pitanju.
tickets.feedback:
We must be careful with macros that can be used for different currencies (in this case).


The user was asking for our help to enable NGN currency on their account, and not INR.

As for the verification, the process was properly epedited and the user was provided with an article to check which documents are acceptable for L2.

tickets.notes:
Uredno provereno na PIQ-u i korisnik obavesten da pokusa da promeni konekciju.

Nakon toga, napravljen uspesan depozit.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the user ID on PIQ and confirmed that this was an IP-related issue, so we properly suggested to the user to change their connection.

It is important to know the difference between our site regulation errors and provider-specific flags. In this case, the issue was with a provider. The users will usually be able to access the site and initiate a deposit, but their deposits will be rejected in the transaction history because the provider flagged their Ontario IP address. In a situation where the provider flags the IP address as Ontario, whitelisting won't help, so it was the correct course of action to advise a change in the connection.

After the connection was changed, a successful deposit was made. üëå

tickets.notes: Korisnik uredno informisan da aplikacija trenutno nije dostupna za Android uredjaje.
tickets.feedback: We properly informed the user that the official application is still not available for Android devices. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes: Prema ToS policy, South Africa je jedna od restricted zemalja. Ovde je korisnika trebalo uputiti na politiku i zakone o online kladjenju njegove drzave.
tickets.feedback:
South Africa is one of the restricted countries according to the ToS policy: https://stake.com/policies/terms


Based on that, we cannot contradict the policy and confirm that the user shouldn't have issues using our services.

Our response should have been similar to this:

"Please check the list of restricted areas in section 14 of the Terms of Service policy on the following link: https://stake.com/policies/terms

If your country is not listed there, you should be able to use our services.

However, ensure to check the laws of your country regarding online gambling before you continue to use our platform, and stay up to date with them.

If you need anything else, don't hesitate to contact us."

tickets.notes: Affiliate commission - uredno proveren nalog i eskalirano za konverziju sredstava.
tickets.feedback:
The account was properly checked, and this was escalated further for conversion.

Once it was done, the user was properly informed that the funds were converted and credited to their Vault. üëå

tickets.notes: SE procedura uredno ispracena.
tickets.feedback:
The user was properly informed about the options we offer on the site and, based on their decision, instructed on where they can initiate exclusion on their account.

The account is excluded, as per the user's wish, so our efficiency was great. ‚úÖ

tickets.notes: Ontario - problem sa blokiranom IP adresom za depozite uredno reseno.
tickets.feedback:
We properly checked the user ID on PIQ and confirmed that this was an IP-related issue, so we properly suggested to the user to change their connection.


It is important to know the difference between our site regulation errors and provider-specific flags. In this case, the issue was with a provider. The users will usually be able to access the site and initiate a deposit, but their deposits will be rejected in the transaction history because the provider flagged their Ontario IP address. In a situation where the provider flags the IP address as Ontario, whitelisting won't help, so it was the correct course of action to advise a change in the connection.

The user managed to deposit the funds successfully, so our assistance was great. üëå
